attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it lawful for any resident of any property to take whatever action is deemed necessary by them, within the boundaries of the property they occupy, to protect themselves against crime and anti-social behaviour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been told by the police that they will no longer respond to calls from people suffering terrorism from dysfunctional government funded families in sink housing estates yet any steps taken by householders are IMMEDIATELY respondend to by the police, who can always find time and manpower to persecute the innocent.  It is about time this government declared that the country is ungovernable and made it lawful for householders to defend themselves by granting immunity from prosecution when death or serious injury is caused to perpetrators of crime against their property.
